title: SF Letterpress Printers
content:
Here are a few I was able to locate, ranked somewhat in order based on recommendations. I haven't actually tried worked with any, yet.   
   
Alan Hillesheim   
Digger Pine Press   
651-G Addison Street   
Berkeley 94710   
548-2448   
   
Seibert Richard Letterpress   
510 845 8566   
   
Julie Holcomb Printers   
510 654 6416   
   
Crafty Cards   
(510)849-CARD   
 [www.craftycards.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172114/http:/www.craftycards.net/)  
   
Mercurio Bros. Printing   
2830 San Pablo Ave.   
Berkeley, CA 510 845 2600 fax 510 845 1630
author: Jared Benson

comments.content:
Digital Engraving on 9th at Folsom is excellent. I've wroked with them for years.   
   
Full Circle Press in Grass Valley is also top notch and considerably cheaper than any other LP printer around. They're very cool about sending press sheets so you don't have t make press checks.   
   
I've worked with Mercurio Brothers before (though not for LP), a good choice for the budget-conscious project.   
   
Julie actually refused to let me make a press check. Haven't worked with her since.
